articles.author: Jon Porter
articles.title: Siri gets a new voice in iOS 15.4 beta - The Verge
articles.description: iOS 15.4’s fourth beta has added a fifth American voice for its Siri voice assistant. Apple’s user-facing interface simply calls it “Voice 5,” but its filename refers to the new voice as “Quinn.”
articles.content:
The new voice was recorded by a member of the LGBTQ+ community
Illustration by Alex Castro / The Verge
The latest beta of iOS 15.4 adds a fifth American voice for its Siri voice assistant. Apples u… [+1391 chars]

articles.title: Hold the donuts: Dunkin' Donuts to temporarily close all Singapore outlets due to 'operational issues' - CNA
articles.description:
SINGAPORE: American donut and coffee chain Dunkin’ Donuts is temporarily closing all its outlets in Singapore from Wednesday (Feb 23) due to “operational issues”.
